name: Multi-Use Softening Leave In Conditioner
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:A multiuse leave-in conditioner that softens, smooths, and detangles while increasing shine and elasticity and supporting healthy hair growth..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Moisturizes and strengthens dry, brittle hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Bamboo Extract: With silica, amino acids; moisturizes and increases growth, shine, and elasticity..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This moisturizing leave-in conditioner nourishes in seven different ways. The wheat amino acids and hydrolyzed wheat proteins fortify and reduce breakage while aloe vera, turnip root, white tea, rosemary, chamomile, argan, baobab seed, jojoba, and spearmint hydrate, soften, strengthen, and stimulate..Fragrance Description:Bright with notes of spearmint and chamomile.
ingredients: -Bamboo Extract: With silica, amino acids; moisturizes and increases growth, shine, and elasticity..-Pro-Vitamin B5: Prevents dehydration and promotes moisture retention in hair and scalp..-Hops Extract: Anti-inflammatory; visibly reduces hair fall and promotes growth and shine...Water (Aqua, Eau), Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/ Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Behentrimonium Methosulfate (Non-Sulfate Derived From Rapeseed Oil), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel (Argan) Oil, Wheat Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Brassica Rapa (Turnip) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Humulus Lupulus (Hops) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Extract, Bambusa Vulgaris (Bamboo) Extract, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.As a conditioner: .-Apply to wet hair, then rinse away...As a deep conditioner: .-Apply to wet hair, leave on for 30 minutes, then rinse away...As a leave-in conditioner: .-Apply to wet hair and style as usual...As a detangler: .-Apply to wet or dry hair. .-Work through with fingertips to gently remove knots and shed hair...As a pre-poo: .-Apply to wet or dry hair. .-Work it through alongside Multi-Use Pure Oil Blend (sold separately) to remove shed hair and prep the hair for your cleanser...As a daily moisturizer: .-Apply to wet or dry hair, work in, and style as usual...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse, remove bottle caps, and place in your recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice all-around conditioner. If you want to save space in your shower/reduce the amount of products you're using, and have 2c/3a hair, this is a good one! I'm not so sure how this is for moisturizing dry hair, as that's better for more coily textures, but I loved this product as a conditioner and leave-in conditioner. It worked well for my hair air dried without any holding product, air dried with mousse, blow dried with only heat protectant, and blow dried with mousse. My hair stayed soft and tangled less throughout the week. It is a little heavier than some other leave-ins I've liked, but I don't find it weighs my hair down. I do have alopecia and very thin, fine hair, so if it works for me, I think it would work for a lot of wavy and curly hair types! The product has a pleasant texture - it's not goopy or stringy, and distributes easily. Bonus points for having a light scent (some hair products have such strong scents that I get a headache).  I did receive this product from Skeepers, but was not paid or otherwise compensated for the review.

The Turnip Root Extract, White Tea Leaf Extract, Rosemary Leaf Extract, Hops Extract, Chamomile, Aloe Vera, Argan Oil, Baobab Seed Oil, Jojoba Oil and Spearmint work to  hydrate, soften, condition, promote the elasticity and flexibility of the hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Melanin Multi-Use Softening Leave-In Conditioner, and I'm absolutely thrilled with the results. This product has quickly become a staple in my hair care routine. First and foremost, the scent is divine. It's a pleasant, subtle fragrance that lingers in your hair without being overpowering. It leaves your hair smelling fresh and clean all day long. But the real magic happens when you apply the product. The Melanin Leave-In Conditioner is incredibly lightweight, which is perfect for my fine, curly hair. It effortlessly detangles my locks, making it so much easier to manage and style. Even on my busiest mornings, I can count on this conditioner to save me time and reduce frizz. One of the standout features of this product is its versatility. As a multi-use conditioner, I love that it can be applied on damp hair after a shower, acting as a leave-in conditioner, or spritzed on throughout the day to refresh and hydrate my curls. It's become my go-to for those mid-day hair pick-me-ups. I've also noticed a significant improvement in the overall health of my hair since incorporating this leave-in conditioner into my routine. My curls are more defined, softer, and free from that dreaded dryness and frizz. I even use it before heat styling, and it acts as an effective heat protectant. For those concerned about ingredients, Melanin's commitment to quality shows. This leave-in conditioner is free from harmful chemicals and sulfates, which is a big win for anyone trying to maintain healthy, natural hair. In summary, the Melanin Multi-Use Softening Leave-In Conditioner has truly transformed my hair care game. Whether you have curls, waves, or straight hair, this product is versatile, nourishing, and smells amazing. It's become a must-have in my daily routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, multi-purpose leave-in conditioner. Your hair will thank you!

I also use this in my little girl's hair and it is wonderful. My daughter is bi-racial (African American and Latina) with thick, but looser curls than mine and the product works very well for her hair as well. I don't plan to look for an alternative to this product. I am very satisfied with it and think that the price point is reasonable.  If I had to say one downside it is only that I tend to need a lot of the product for my hair type (very tight, afro curls) so I feel I do have to re-purchase rather frequently (every 4-6 weeks). My ends are really dry and damaged so I need to use some form of leave in treatment. This keeps my hair relatively soft and hydrated, but it's hard to use the optional amount. If I don't use enough my hair still feels dry. If i use too much it looks super greasy. Because of this I've started using it mostly as an overnight leave in treatment, or on non-wash days when I need more hydration on the ends. It also helps to protect my hair at the beach or pool when I don't care if my hair looks a bit dirty. Overall I do like this but it didn't serve the purpose I was looking for with a leave in treatment.

reviews.review_title: good formula. bad for your manicure
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this stuff for my hair. makes it so soft and help my curls fall beautifully. however it reacts with nail polish and will strip it and leave a tacky surface to a previously great manicure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The conditioner itself works beautifully on my type 3c-4a hair but the spearmint/toothpaste scent is weird and very strong initially. Dissipated after a few hours but still lingers close to the scalp. I have other conditioners that work just as well without the weird scent so I wont be repurchasing but I dont regret giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I applied to hair and said this stuff doesnt work.  So I sort of became distracted for a while and started to twist hair.  My hair felt softer.  So, the conditioner needed time to worku2026.applied to dry hair.  I did feel a differenceu2026..softer.  So, now, I feel conditioner works.  So, will order the oil.  Also, since the one ingredient is water, it still worked. I thought water would make conditioner not work, but I worked.  Sort of costly, but amount is generous.  Also, at time ordered, there was no shipping.  Have to wait for deals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only hair product that works on my dry, curly hair. It keeps my hair moisturizer and the shape of the curl in tact.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this multi use conditioner. I use it as a conditioner after shampooing and also a leave in. It has a ton of slip and I have 4B hair. It has the spearmint gum smell and I love it. Im on my 4th bottle and will continue to repurchase it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great multi use conditioner! I like to use it after I wash as a deep conditioner/leave in and it works really well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ABSOLUTELY Love this product! I apply to my soaking wet 4c hair in show! Smooth though from scalp to ends!   After about 5 mins I towel dry my hair lightly and follow up with oil than one more small layering of this cream before braiding and my hair is soft and hydrated for 5 days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I  have fine almost baby hair. My hair is long. Its a bit fragile and prone to breaking and frizz. This leave in conditioner is the best I have ever used.   Im not a fan of the smell. Its a bit overwhelming for me. The good news is it doesnt last long. It dissipated within 5-10 minutes.

reviews.review_title: Hard pass! Product creates dry, frizzy hair.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my curly hair even drier! It has no smoothing property and no slip in my hair. After drying and straightening, my hair feels very heavy and unconditioned. Whats worse is that since glycerin is a humectant and actually pulls in moisture from the air, my hair gets frizzier throughout the day. Dont purchase if youre desire is smooth, conditioned hair. Maybe its okay for those that wear natural curls as their style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glycerine...If you have issues with glycerine, you will have issues with this product. I didn't read the ingredients list before I purchased because I was so excited to see that one of my fav YTers had a product line. This may get returned, my high porosity hair just can't do glycerine. Let this be a warning.  It has great ingredients otherwise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, maybe this just doesnt work for my hair. I used my u201cnormalu201d amount of leave-in the first time, and it left my hair feeling sticky and heavy when it dried. Next time I used less and really made an effort to work it through my hair, but then my hair was just left super dry and knotted. Plus as others have mentioned, it has a really strong and not very pleasant smell. Ill continue to use this until empty, but wont be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is very effective at providing moisture with a pleasant scent. Just a small amount is needed even when applied to my thick, coarse hair. Would definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick unruly 4c tightly coiled hair and this product combined with the oil helps me keep flakes away and moistures my hair like no other! Its a must keep on shelves. This is literally my third bottle!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, thin, wavy hair. Just a small pump does wonders for me! It does not weigh my hair down if I use just enough and leaves my hair soft and shiny. I actually really love the smell of it. Its minty with a touch of tea. If you are not into mint scents or tea scents such as chamomile then stay away. This bottle will last for a long time since I only use about half a pump. Happy to find something that works

reviews.review_title: Great product,  awful scent of spearmint
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is awful. It smells like toothpaste,  you'll have people asking you all day if you just brushed your teeth. The sad part is,  the conditioner itself is great. It is very moisturizing and detangles. I hope they either change the scent or offer additional scents in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, fragile, grey, curly hair. This product is a bit heavy for me BUT its SO moisturizing and GREAT at detangling. The scent smells like a pack of spearmint gum and its VERY refreshing. The shampoo is fantastic too. Great ingredients. Great results. Use the oil before bed if you dont like wearing a silk or satin wrap. It prevents breaking while you sleep. I also will oil up extra good before wash day for extra moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I washed my hair last night and the smell has been with me all day. It smells like peppermint but not in a good way. I cant say that I will be reaching for this again anytime soon. I hope it fades before I have to wash my hair again to get rid of the smell. This is the second product from this line that has a smell that I just do not like. Its a shame too because I really want to support his product line.
Really good product. Definitely my go to now. To address the scent in other reviews, it doesnt smell bad at all. Smells like peppermint

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally cannot stop telling everybody how good this conditioner is. I recently relaxed my hair (I have naturally 4C coily textured hair) so I was very hesitant to wash my hair at first in fear of my hair tangling up and becoming a mess to detangle. I used a small amount of the shampoo (which is also great!) and it worked wonders with getting the chemical relaxer smell out of my hair and cleaning the product build up out but when my hair started knotting together I started to worry.  When I say I applied this conditioner to my hair and knots magically disappeared I was so surprised. Literally applied it and ran my hands through my hair and it was like butter! And Im so glad its also a leave in conditioner since it left my hair so soft and hydrated after I blew it out and straightened it that I applied even more before I wrapped my hair up and applied the Melanin oil blend to my ends to finish myself up. Im literally obsessed and can see this being my go to product to keep up my relaxed hair care regimen.  The smell is pretty strong so I will say if youre sensitive to things such as that, than this product may not be best for you but Ill also recommend to just plug your nose and make do because the benefits for such a great conditioner is so worth it. Will definitely be buying again once I run out (which in my case may be very soon since Im addicted.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im a basic white girl, but I have curly hair and this products ingredient list looked ideal for my thick, non-porous curls. Honestly the best leave in conditioner Ive used! Doesnt weigh down my curls and conditions them well. Amazing product for dry curls!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It is a lovely, creamy, clean-smelling (like Mother Nature clean) product that works on multiple hair types. I have curly hair and my daughters have textures that vary from loose curls to wavy - and this leave-works on both. My natural hair lasts at least 4 days from a wash-n-go. I trust this brand and the ingredients they use. AAANND Theres so much product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh wow the smell is addictive I love minty things! So this worked better for my kiddos than with my natural brown hair but when I started dying my hair it helped out sooooo much! It melts in my hair and mixes well with other products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter has crazy hair. The bottom layer is beautiful soft ringlet curls. The top layer is wavy and gets frizzy and the ends are dry. Ive spent years and hundreds upon hundred of dollars looking for/trying shampoo, conditioner, leave in, oil etc etc looking for something anything to help with the frizzy dry parts of her hair. This by far is the best product I have found. It helps detangle and really softens her hair. Her hair dries beautifully. Now after a day or so (do not wash her hair everyday) it doesnt look as good, but I wouldnt expect it too. Im going to try re-wetting her hair and putting a little more in. For reference my daughter has light brown somewhat fine hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is magic!  I can FINALLY de tangle my hair without spending hours finger combing and cursing under my breath.  I will use nothing but Melanin Haircare from here on out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The multi-use leave not only smells good, my hair feels great every time I use it. Top 5 fave leave ins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought SO MANY leave in conditioners since my main one I used to use was discontinued. This is the only one that actually detangles at all, I have really long hair down to my bottom, so I usually wear braids because otherwise it's a tangled mess which makes it wavy when my braids are taken out but if I just left it, it would be straight. It's also super humid where I live. I just wish it helped more with breakage and I wish there was more products for natural breakage, everything is for dyed damaged hair and my hair is just normal, natural with natural breakage. Oh and having hair this long it's nice to have a bottle last longer than a week that's not $100. So please restock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff. Purchased 2 bottles of the leave in. It literally melts tangles and is the perfect multi use product. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this and my hair does too! I mainly use it as a leave in conditioner, deep conditioner or to refresh/ moisturize my hair but you really cant go wrong using it in any of the ways listed. My hair drinks it right up!   For reference I have 4b and 4a hair texture that is high porosity. This conditioner is great especially for curly kinky coily hair and is a staple for me. Ive bought at least 5 bottles since Melanin Haircare has been released.

reviews.review_title: I Love Melanin Hair Care on my locs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have followed the creator of the product for quite a few years, even before she started the product line. Because she had such a focus on natural products for natural hair, I trusted her to come out with a great hairline that would be safe and nourishing. Melanin Hair Care did not disappoint. I tried all three products and loved themall. My hair  was moisturized and soft, and a little goes a long way. I have locs now, and was worried about the product leaving a residue, which can happen with thick hair products, but the leavin has worked wonderfully, my locs are moisturized and healthy, and it soaked in very well.

reviews.review_title: Ive found the one! No other conditioner for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the BEST conditioner I have ever used in my 32 years. Melts away tangles, hydrates hair, and smells amazing! From the very first time I tried this product, I immediately decided that I would never be using anything else and proceeded to text everyone I know with textured hair to try this. One of my friends just tried it and felt the same way: u201c I absolutely LOVED the conditioner. It has a lot a slip and I seriously think this is the most moisturizing conditioner I have ever used. I dont know what she put in there but Im obsessed with it! and I definitely cut down my detangling time. I gotta get some more. Its bomb!u201d All that to say, you need to buy this. And when youre running low, buy at least two more. Because its sells out for good reason - and I drove all around my city trying to find a bottle (thankfully successfully)!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product and the multi-use of it. It is a very quality made product. I have used it a few times now and will continue to buy it. I love that it is natural and healthy for my hair. It makes my hair soft and fills it with moisture. Excellent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didnt like the smell for a conditioner...mint.  aside from that, if I used as leave I  conditioner, my ends would get greasy as soon as I straightened my hair. as a conditioner in the shower, it did leave my hair soft. but the smell, i did like the pump to get product out.  just not good. overall wouldn't repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does exactly what it says for my coils! Love all their styling products and would highly recommend - especially during winter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My 3c hair was noticeably softer after. I didn't use a lot, but even 2 quarters worth helped alongside olive oil and coconut oil hair products

reviews.review_title: Awesome Product, Less than Great Shipping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite conditioner/LIC/styler! I always reach for Melanin Hair Care Multi-Use Softening Leave In Conditioner when styling my fiance, my cousins, my nana and mom and of course my own hair! It has good slip, great for detangling, smells delightful and not very strong, moisturizes, softens, defines (finer textures really well), and is from a black woman owned business whos been on YouTube for ages now showing us how to make the same great products right at home. The only negative comment I have is that the Sephora packaging wasnt great. My bottle arrived with the pump top completely snapped off *sad face* (pic of bottle received today, and a previous wash day with MHC)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its very hydratingu2026but it smells like stale toothpaste. Im still trying to figure out if I can get past that smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my hair feel dry like hay and it smelled like toothpaste. I walked around all day smelling like I put toothpaste in my hair:(:(:(

reviews.review_title: It's constantly sold out for a reason!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first leave in conditioner that my hair does not have a fight with. Most leave in conditioners for natural hair use coconut oil. Newsflash, not every curly/coily girl can use coconut oil and my hair will react if it is in there. So I appreciate Melanin leave in. My hair loves it, it doesn't dry out or make my scalp have a fit  and it gives the slip and protection my hair needs. If you are a coconut oil sensitive natural, try this.

reviews.review_title: So good my man stole it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did not disappoint . Very moisturizing. I'm back for a second bottle because my man tires and is threarhinfg to steal it.  He used on his hair before a camping trip and said after 3 days in the woods his hair was still soft and moisturized. If that's not the ultimate test, I don't know what is, lol.  I also love smell a lot of product goes a long way.   Its a winner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: you need this. i have tried so many leave-in and detanglers, this is the best of both worlds. it leaves my hair (3b) moisturized and it makes it so easy to detangle! i use a rizos curl brush and this, makes wash day so easy. the only downside is is the minty smell which goes away. btw im polynesian and latina, and i bleach and color my hair so its high porosity and very dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In well over a decade of being natural I've tried a lot of leave-ins but have literally always returned to KT Kink Kurly ... until trying this. I've been getting the best twist outs of my life and realized it's due to this leave-in. I have 4a/4b curl patterns.  FWIW, it doesn't make my hair feel the same as KTKK (not the same slip and def not as watery) but my hair seems to be holding moisture way better than with anything else and is elongating more (plus you get WAY more for the price). Don't forget that it's a cream leave-in so you have to spray your hair down first, then apply this, then seal it with an oil/butter, if you just apply this by itself your hair will probably feel a little dry because you haven't sealed it in. But y'all know that.  I've been natural for going on 13 years I think? And I remember watching Whitney (Melanin's founder) in my dorm room on YouTube back in the DAY when natural hair gurus were guiding us all through the transitioning phase and admiring her depth of knowledge and commitment to only using high quality, natural and simple ingredients (far and away more than I ever did) even if it meant having to concoct them herself. Kinda nice to see her come so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE! I use this everyday the spearmint smell stays with me all day and my hair feels so soft !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff dried my hair out sooooo bad. I returned it. I would NOT recommend.

reviews.review_title: This Leave In is...I'm in love
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing for my coily hair.  After using the leave in conditioner, it left my hair so soft, manageable, curl defined and JUICY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so happy sephora sells Melanin now! I've tried pretty much everything from this brand and it has all exceeded my expectations. But my favorite is this multi use conditioner. I use it mainly as a detangler the night before I shampoo. This allows me to get through wash day faster.  I just part my hair in sections,  put some conditioner on a section and detangle with a felicia Leatherwood brush. And when I do wash,  but hair feels more conditioned, like I used a light overnight treatment. it doesn't weigh my hair down at all. (I have low-ish porosity loose curls and waves). The bottle is pretty big.  and it smells like mint.  Definitely repurchasing when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute favorite. A must have in my hair regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this leave in conditioner. Keeps my hair moisturizer and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I put everyone I know on to it. I have type 4 hair and sections of high and low porosity and this product consistently goes above and beyond to  hydrate. you can detangle with it too. I use it all the time as a leave in for twist outs, co washes, blow outs etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is SUCH a great product. I use it as a cowash mostly, and then as a finishing leave-in over my other products. I have platinum/white hair (2c/3a and fine/average) and it's been wonderful in helping maintain the softness of my curls/waves despite the bleaching I do. It smells lovely, works brilliantly, and you cannot beat the price. It works great over my Unbreak my Blonde leave-in and as a cowash I feel like it cleanses super well while giving my hair a lot of detangling and slip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh this stuff is magic for my hair!  Moisturizing without weighing my hair down.  Im so happy to be able to purchase this at Sephora!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this conditioner, it melts away my knots like no other! I always use it as a leave in or a styler  - NO RISING OUT FOR ME it's to good to waste. Smells like mint so you always feel refreshed after using.
